page.title: 16Pets in the home
page.content: The definition of pets in relation to the animals kept by the families within the grid area is rather vague! We have defined it as any animal kept at home rather than at a farm or small holding, and not kept for slaughter. { Dogs Cats {Tortoise Goldfish {Tropical fish Terrapins {Rabbits Guinea pigs {Caged birds (extremely popular) {Goats Chickens {Ducks Geese {Pony Horse These are the usual or popular pets.The keeping of caged birds (finches,canaries,budgies) seems especially popular in this area. There are also the less popular pets such as exotic snakes,gerbils, and one boy even catches and keeps spiders as pets!
